description: One of Kawachi`s opponents in the Newcomer`s battle, he was able to design a very nice looking bread in the shape of his girlfriend. However, after he lost, he began to wander the mountains, and met a pig, who taught him all about pigs. After granting the pig`s final request—-eating it-—his face had a reaction, causing his face to resemble a pig.
name: Umino Katsuo
